ComicInfo.Summary: Simpy is thrown from a lifeboat to appease the sharks but the sharks send him back.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 15:23:02. [CVDB166054] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:37:11. [Issue ID 250712]

ComicInfo.Title: One Super Day at the Gorge; The Tox-Sick Avenger!; Charlie's Hotties; The Painter's Fantasy; It's Practically Magic Part II; Caractors; A Cracked Look at the Secret Lives of Carts!; A Bad Day for the Whassup Dude!; The $64,000,000 Cracked-Pot Question; When Being with the Obese Is a Blessing!; Christmas Toys for the New Millennium!; Why It's Great to Be a Dog...; If Santa Lived Like the Rest of Us!; What Parents Say, What Parents Mean...; It's Practically Magic; Off the Cave Wall; The Yo-Yo Champion; A Precious Gift; Wedgie Boy!; The Grunch Who Repossessed Christmas; Thrown from Lifeboat
